name: Your Heroes Are Dead
description:
You are the corpse collector. Your job? To collect the bodies of the poor saps who thought they were the hero of the story... but weren't.

Controls:

  • E - interact / pickup body
  • Q - drop the body
  • WASD - move
  • Shift - sprint
  • Ctrl - "crouch" (slow, stealthy walk)
  • F - toggle lantern
